solc-version
vulnerability_findings.message:
Detected issues with version pragma in patch_5.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.19 (patch_5.sol#1): it allows old versions

vulnerability_findings.name: low-level-calls
vulnerability_findings.message:
Low level call in Token.withdrawToken (patch_5.sol#29-38):
	-require(bool)(token.call(bytes4(keccak256()(transfer(address,uint256))),to,amount)) patch_5.sol#37

vulnerability_findings.name: low-level-calls
vulnerability_findings.message:
Low level call in TokenBank.withdrawToHolder (patch_5.sol#73-83):
	-require(bool)(addr.call.value(weiAmount)()) patch_5.sol#81

vulnerability_findings.name: naming-convention
